mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_COM_AUDIT (USER_NO, TRANSACTION_NAME, REG_DATE) values (#{userNo},#{transactionName}, GETDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT A.LOGIN_TYPE as loginType, A.LOGIN_ENABLE as loginEnable, A.SHA_REPEAT_CNT as shaRepeatCnt, A.CORS_DOMAIN as corsDomain, A.CORS_HEADER as corsHeader FROM T_COM_CONFIG A WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE = #{type}
